mainText:
Thank you for the products , the spirit , the joy, thank you for 
everything. I just opened my computer and saw the sad news. i've seen 
all of his speeches and presentations, and all of them meant very much 
to me. He was a great guy, and a visionary, i believe in Apple, always 
will, but i can't  say i will have the same excitement, that one witch 
only Steve could produce with his worlds. There goes a genius.
author: Debora
